post.name: Audit Officer/Audit Advisor
post.monthly_remuneration: Rs. 50,000/- per month (consolidated). Remuneration will not be a constraint for deserving candidate. TA/DA admissible as per rules for official tour/visit
job_profile: Audit, review, and evaluate the internal control system of the institute and assess adequacy and effectiveness
Perform tasks, consolidate results, and monitor/coordinate with auditors
Assist institute in improvement of internal controls and review financial/administrative procedures
Assist authorities in interpretation of service rules, CCS rules, and institute rules
Ensure compliance with GFR and other applicable rules & regulations
Inspect, examine, and pre-audit bills before submission to Finance and Accounts Section
Oversee pre, internal, statutory, and C&AG audit and ensure compliance with guidelines
Assist authorities in preparing replies to audit paras
Any responsibility assigned by the Institute authority
post.contract_tenure: Initially one year, may extend up to 3 terms, total duration including renewals limited to 3 years

essential: Member of Institute of Chartered Accountants of India
Good working knowledge of computer applications and accounting software
desirable: Knowledge of statutory compliance, auditing techniques, internal audit standards issued by ICAI
IIA Certification like Certified Internal Auditor (CIA)
Certificate Course on Internal Audit by ICAI

post.experience: Analogous post in Level-10 for 5 years or Level-9 for 7 years in Audit wing of an educational institution of national importance funded by Govt. of India/Central/State Govt./Autonomous bodies/PSU/Central/State University

application_instructions.submission: CV/application in prescribed format with self-attested certificates in a single PDF via email at establishment@nita.ac.in by 04:00 PM of 16-09-2024
application_instructions.shortlisted_candidates: Will be informed via email with tentative date & time of interview
application_instructions.documents_to_bring: Filled-in application form, recent passport-size photograph, all original documents with self-attested copies

terms_conditions: Appointment purely on contract basis on fixed pay, initially one year, extendable up to 3 terms, total duration 3 years
Decision of Competent Authority is final & binding
One month notice or pay in lieu required for leaving during contract
Engagement may be discontinued at any time; does not confer right of continuation
Competent Authority may relax/modify eligibility criteria if candidate otherwise suitable
Canvassing or outside influence liable for rejection
Superannuated employees of Central Govt./State Govt./PSU encouraged to apply
Experience certificates from employer should be attached
In case of dispute, Director's decision is final & binding
